content: the hook - 1 increase 4 single_crochet in the last stitch 1 increase on the other side of the chain 8 single_crochet work with red yarn 2 8 single_crochet 3 1 increase *8 16 single_crochet work with dark red yarn 4 - 5 16 single_crochet 6 1 single_crochet 1 increase *8 24 single_crochet 7 - 8 24 single_crochet 9 2 single_crochet 1 increase *8 32 single_crochet 10 - 13 32 single_crochet 4 row 14 1 decrease 2 single_crochet *8 24 single_crochet 15 1 decrease 1 single_crochet *8 16 single_crochet fill with filler 16 1 decrease *8 8 single_crochet fasten_off the last stitch close the hole with a needle 3 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- сrochet pattern by natalia erkhova www etsy com/shop/crochetbynataerkhova www facebook com/crochetbynataliaerkhova www instagram com/crochet_natalia small strawberry work with light green yarn 3 chain this is the base of the first row work in a circle 1 from the second stitch from the hook - 1 increase 4 single_crochet in the last stitch 1 increase on the other side of the chain 8 single_crochet 2 8 single_crochet 3 1 increase *8 16 single_crochet 4 - 5 16 single_crochet 6 1 single_crochet 1 increase *8 24 single_crochet 7 - 10 24 single_crochet 4 row 11 1 decrease 1 single_crochet *8 16 single_crochet fill with filler 12 1 decrease *8 8 single_crochet fasten_off the last stitch close the hole with a needle leaves for big strawberries work with green yarn 1 9 chain from the second stitch from the hook - 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch *9 close in a ring 2 on the inner circle of the part - 9 single_crochet 3 1 single_crochet 1 decrease *4 5 single_crochet 4 - 5 5 single_crochet 6 4 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch fasten_off cut and hide the thread finished detail 4 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- сrochet pattern by natalia erkhova www etsy com/shop/crochetbynataerkhova www facebook com/crochetbynataliaerkhova www instagram com/crochet_natalia leaves for medium strawberries 1 8 chain from the second stitch from the hook - 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch *9 close in a ring 2 on the inner circle of the part - 9 single_crochet 3 1 single_crochet 1 decrease *4 5 single_crochet 4 - 5 5 single_crochet 6 4 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch fasten_off cut and hide the thread leaves for small strawberries 1 7 chain from the second stitch from the hook - 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch *8 close in a ring 2 on the inner circle of the part - 8 single_crochet 3 1 decrease 1 single_crochet *2 1 decrease 5 single_crochet 4 - 5 5 single_crochet 6 4 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch fasten_off cut and hide the thread assembly 1 fix the leaves on the strawberry with pins then sew in the photo white lines indicate the places where two leaves are stitched together all the leaves should be attached in this way 2 use yellow yarn to embroider seeds on strawberries done thank
